website_summaries.verdict: A set of 4 wide glass mugs that work well for special hot drinks or soup.
pros: Good size for soup or cereal
Can be heated or reheated easily
Handle does not get hot when heated in the microwave
cons: The seam on each mug is visible on the side opposite the handle

customer_reviews.title: This product broke after having coffee into it, it’s not safe for heat.
customer_reviews.text: I did like at first. The other day we got coffee and as soon as we pored it into it it cracked. Needless to say coffee went everywhere and we had a big mess and I almost cut myself. Glad I didn’t as I’m on blood thinner and that might have landed me in the ER. We also had to make another pot of coffee. I’d give this product a minus zero. I only gave one star, because I had to, to submit rating.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Brews a nice cuppa
customer_reviews.text: For the tea connaisseur, drop the tea into this and drink right from the cup, without straining. Gets a bit strong, but the more some teas are disturbed, the more the flavor gets broken. Especially true for Hao Ya Keemun. Unlike some other glass cups, these are study and will last
customer_reviews.author: Spinozist

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! They’re huge and arrived perfectly packaged. Been using my mugs for weeks now, pouring boiling water in them and putting them in the dishwasher...no problems. They’re sturdy and large!! Perfect for soups and smoothie bowls :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bowls for soup
customer_reviews.text: These are just the right size for a can or soup, or ladle or two of homemade. The handle makes it easy to hold hot liquids, and they're pure glass, so no nasty plastic, and they're dandy in the microwave. We use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Northwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Wish there were matching saucers
customer_reviews.text: A great size and unlike ceramic, they don't stain from coffee, tea, etc. I've been waiting for years for somebody to make these! Now if Luminarc would just make matching clear glass saucers to fit them - those are pretty much impossible to find.
customer_reviews.author: ldl

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in thousands of pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered smashed into little pieces. Not just broken, smashed to little bits. Reordered and they were perfect but they are NOT 24.5 oz. They are 22 oz .
customer_reviews.author: T. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: These are great. One thing these are not 24
customer_reviews.text: These are great. One thing these are not 24.5 oz. We tested when we got it and used 10 oz twice on our krups and it almost over filled. Kinda a bummer hoping for bigger but they are great if you don't mind only being 20 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Shel la

customer_reviews.title: Good mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Good mugs. I like the size, but wish they could have been slightly bigger. I have a set of mugs that are bigger that I've own for almost 20 years! Tried to find mugs that were similar, but difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Beckum MD

customer_reviews.title: This is my new mug friend. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my new mug friend. I use it for soups, stews, hot chocolate etc. Just right for a soup or stew meal or that long-movie cup of hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: El sie Nicohls

customer_reviews.title: nice bargain
customer_reviews.text: I bought beautiful bowls, plates and glasses set. it's clear with streaks of blue, the bowls are too large for young children's cereal. I purchased the mugs and drew blue non toxic marker streaks on them, look like thy're part of my set
customer_reviews.author: gayleb

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The first set I bought 3 out of the 4 were chipped or cracked because of the way they were packed so I sent them back and this time they were fine, great mugs!!!
customer_reviews.author: KAM746

customer_reviews.title: Cracking after first use
customer_reviews.text: These cups are indeed large and nice looking. I've only had them a week, but have enjoyed drinks and soups out of them. Because of the wide mouth, it is difficult not to slosh if you fill the cup all the way. Unfortunately, my cups are already showing cracks on the inside and one mug is lightly chipped on the side. I do not reccomend. Pros: Large Versatile Nice looking Cons: Hard to fill all the and use without spilling Already cracking
customer_reviews.author: Cherbear

customer_reviews.title: Best mug ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs. They make my food taste better. Everything tastes better when served using this mug. I eat instant ramen with this mug. Soup in this mug. Cereal in this mug. Coffee in this mug. The possibilities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost impurity-free glass
customer_reviews.text: Super well made and sturdy. Nearly blemish or impurity-free glass quality. Love the capacity and depth. Might be the largest capacity glass mug out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but....
customer_reviews.text: Cups look great but the are horrible insulated. My cooky cooled down within 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Rocco90046

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great all-purpose mugs for everything from coffee to soups and small servings of food. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Large, sturdy and attractive. Seems to hold up okay in the microwave, too.
customer_reviews.author: reballens

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping! Love the large see through cup that fits under my espresso maker.
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping! Love the large see through cup that fits under my espresso maker. There is a molding seam but, that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Sevynof9

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Like the big glass mugs, love drink'g my tea in them - great that they're lead free. Going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: monica f.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a busy working or leisurely morning! The envy of the household!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Perfect to use for a bowl as well as a coffee or tea mug.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: And its a great feeling to know they are lead free containers
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are superb. Tea tastes so much more alive drinking from the mugs. And its a great feeling to know they are lead free containers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wellin

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Cup
customer_reviews.text: These cups are perfect, as described, they really are 24 oz cups. And they handle the microwave just fine too. My partner likes to eat his soup out of them. Or he makes a really, really big cup of coffee. So they take hot liquids well, and they can go in the microwave. I imagine they'd be okay in the refrigerator but I wouldn't put them in the freezer. These cups are perfect for any "mug" recipes you may have for your microwave. I will buy these again if (when?) I drop and break the ones I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Distraida

customer_reviews.title: Great Cups for Hot Liquids
customer_reviews.text: These cups are well made and very durable. They are ideal for hot liquids. They are made in the United States and Lead Free. I would heavily recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USA made mugs
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are made in the USA. Not from China. So no lead base materials. That's the best thing about these mugs. Use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs. Use them for soups and chili. Perfect size and great price. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arlav

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Too big to drink coffee from but perfect for soup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for cereal
customer_reviews.text: I'm replacing all my dinnerware with MADE IN USA! These are perfect for cereal, soup - the handle makes it easy to carry plus they're really good looking. I'm glad I found them - bowls with questionable glazes etc from China etc now hold plants - not food.
customer_reviews.author: WBP.

customer_reviews.title: Great large mugs!
customer_reviews.text: My friend asked for large tea mugs that she could also use for soup. These were perfect. They look just as pictured - clear glass and they are very large. Can definitely be used for huge cups of tea/coffee or even a small soup. Great for those cold winter nights when you want something warm. There is a seam on one side opposite the handle but I don't think it hurts the look at all.
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Mug EXPLODED glass upon contact with hot water
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to have to write such a negative review but i can’t figure out how to get in touch with the maker. This mug just EXPLODED while making tea which was not even at boiling. My tea kettle was set to 175 degrees and thank goodness i was letting the tea steep on the counter instead of lifting it to my face when it spontaneously exploded shards of glass all over my kitchen!! Is there a temperature limit?? I did not see one anywhere on the package. VERY DANGEROUS.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Terrific mugs - perfect for soup!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mugs for soup and they are perfect! The glass is thick and strong. The size of the mugs are ideal for a bowl of soup and you can easily carry it off without burning your hands. I was going to use one for a latte, but I have a different set of clear glass mugs for that and decided these would exclusively be for my soup. Great sturdy mugs!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kundart

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WANTED
customer_reviews.text: Love these glass mugs and seller was AMAZING to work with and responded to all my questions immediately. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Huge Mugs at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: What a great coffee, soup, chili, stew mug! Love the size too. I make a big cup of coffee and there's no need to continually refill the mug, that's the best part! There is nothing harmful in the making of the mug so it is food safe unlike other mugs. I will purchase again and give these mugs out as gifts for all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: These are great for tea
customer_reviews.text: These are great for tea, coffee, quick soups or 2 minute meals because, unlike so many other glass mugs, they retain their neutral smell after being microwaved.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: Love these giant glass mugs!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best - they are HUGE! You can feel safe drinking from clear glass, and can even eat/drink soup from these.
customer_reviews.author: Saver I.

customer_reviews.title: If you can only have one cup of coffee a day, use this mug!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for dessert, soup and coffee. Great. The only drawback is the large diameter for coffee, which cools off too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works as they should good for heating up soup and the like. Would consider purchasing again when needed
customer_reviews.author: Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs. I use them for soup, pastas and cereal. Way too big for beverages.
customer_reviews.author: cabooky

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great purchase. They are the same size as typical oversize soup mugs and they have a good thickness to them. I am planning on ordering another set in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: A. Blandford

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for everything! Easy to heat or reheat, perfect tea cup, great for soup/pasta/noodles etc. Love these for everyday use, excellent quality and very durable(+Lot of compliments).
customer_reviews.author: anika

customer_reviews.title: They aren't as big as claimed....
customer_reviews.text: I like the mugs they great, but they would be much better if their capacity was actually 24oz as claimed. They are 20oz at best, so full that you wouldn't be able to carry them without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: steve walker

customer_reviews.title: Cups
customer_reviews.text: Great cups. My husband accidentally dropped one and it didn't break. They are nice and big couldn't be happier. I haven't put them in the microwave yet. The reason being I don't know if it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Gizelle Frye

customer_reviews.title: I love how big these mugs are - whether you're using ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how big these mugs are - whether you're using them as soup or breakfast bowls or as a way to decrease how often you need to refill your mug for tea, I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Kolomyjec

customer_reviews.title: great mugs
customer_reviews.text: these are great, they work well in the microwave and the handle does not get hot. i will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these thank you! Exactly what I wanted! Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: shirley njos

customer_reviews.title: Luminarc Jumbo mug
customer_reviews.text: Great for cereal or latte/melange. Attractive, holds a goodly amount!
customer_reviews.author: D. McK

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the size and feel of these mugs; they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just as described.
customer_reviews.text: All four arrived as described. These are hefty mugs which are well made. Very large, fit at least two rounds of the largest Keurig setting. There is no seam on the side opposite the handle giving them a high quality look.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: As described and a Great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice BIG cups. 4 in a box, all arrived intact.
customer_reviews.author: Boyzoo

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and look expensive and elegant
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and look expensive and elegant. Can't wait to try them out. Large but easy to carry with handle. I love the look!
customer_reviews.author: Savrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, more than large enough and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy glass, I hand wash them just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love those big mugs! The glass quality is amazing - exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: ADIX

customer_reviews.title: Glass is very thin and chipped easily, gonna sand down the chipped ones and use ...
customer_reviews.text: Glass is very thin and chipped easily, gonna sand down the chipped ones and use it to germinate seeds in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

product_meta.title: Luminarc Jumbo Mug, 24.25 oz, Clear, Set of 4
product_meta.description: J0926 features: -Set includes 4 mugs. -Dishwasher safe. -Made in the USA. -Capacity: 24.25 ounces. Country of manufacture: -United States. Product type: -Coffee mug. Color: -Clear. Material: -Glass. Number of items included: -4. Style: -Traditional. Pattern: -Food and drink. Dimensions: Cup/mug height - top to bottom: -3.7". Cup/mug width - side to side: -10.4". Cup/mug depth - front to back: -10.4". Overall product weight: -4.63 lbs.
